name: Only go up
description:
Only go up is a game where you go up to avoid the rising water.

Each time you go up, the concept and chapter of the map change.

For example, in a two-chapter (melted Arctic), the character's friction will decrease and it will slip!

But don't worry. I'll make a checkpoint for you here.

Then, Only go up!


In addition...

This checkpoint function exists, but if you're a person who gives up easily, think twice about purchasing.
